definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: Written translation is completely different from any other type of translation.
sentences.chinese: 筆譯與任何其他類型的翻譯完全不同。

sentences.english: Web searching is now a big walking stick for translators.
sentences.chinese: 網絡搜索現在是筆譯翻譯的一根大柺棍。

sentences.english: Most of the translation is for business clients.
sentences.chinese: 大多數的筆譯客戶來自於商業。

sentences.english: It takes more than knowing two languages to be a good translator or interpreter.
sentences.chinese: 懂得兩種語言並不足以成爲一個優秀的筆譯或口譯員。

sentences.english: If the test in English interpreters, it is more appropriate intermediate or advanced?
sentences.chinese: 假如考酡語筆譯，那中級仍是初級更適宜一些？

sentences.english: It was strongly urged that a translation and interpretation center be set up immediately.
sentences.chinese: 筆譯和口譯中心的成立迫在眉睫。

sentences.english: Supporting pre-sales and implementation, including interpretation and translating;
sentences.chinese: 支持產品售前和實施工作，包括口譯及筆譯。

definition: lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4
